kharjo.name: Blade Master Kharjo
kharjo.title: The Undefeated
kharjo.description: A legendary melee duelist who has never lost a blade-to-blade fight and teaches mastery through discipline, timing, and insight.
kharjo.philosophy: Victory is decided before blades meet.
kharjo.emphasis: Precision, timing, discipline, single combat mastery
kharjo.voiceStyle: Measured, direct, instructional. Never boasts—never needs to.
kharjo.tooltip: Kharjo reflects your character through flawless dueling technique and inner control

levelGreetings.1: You wish to master the blade. I have fought ten thousand duels and won every one. I will teach you why.
levelGreetings.2: Your first victory. Strength alone is insufficient—timing and distance matter more.
levelGreetings.3: You begin to see patterns. Anticipation is the foundation of mastery.
levelGreetings.4: Your footwork improves. The blade becomes an extension of your body.
levelGreetings.5: Every duel is a conversation—strike and counter, action and response.
levelGreetings.6: You develop your own style. This is how masters are born.
levelGreetings.7: You defeat stronger foes through superior skill. Excellent.
levelGreetings.8: Challengers seek you now. Let them come.
levelGreetings.9: Victory without defeat. You approach true mastery.
levelGreetings.10: Undefeated. When blades cross, you will always emerge victorious.
